titleStmt.title: To the most honorable assembly of the Commons House of Parliament a briefe of the petitioners cause.
titleStmt.author: Morley, Caleb.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Concerning the claims of Caleb Morley and Alan Bishop to the living of the church of Stalbridge.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
